document_data.name: Wyrmwizz
document_data.creator: [[Gyudd's Distillery]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Wyrmwizz''' was a type of [[ale]] brewed in [[Skullport]].
document_data.Description: It was an extremely low quality, muddy beverage.
document_data.History:
Wyrmwizz was produced at [[Gyudd's Distillery]] in Skullport. As of 1493 [[DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} this ale was available from the [[Black Tankard]] and the [[Worm's Gullet]] taverns.

One of the regular buyers of Wyrmwizz from Gyudd's Distillery was [[Azrok]] from [[Undermountain]]. He had a storage room where he kept it stored.
